transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan boliye.
Customer: Sir Ratna baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan haan boliye madam.
Customer: Just a minute sir catalog open kar rahi thi abhi.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Just a minute. Aapka abhi sudden call aaya sir matlab maine call gaya tha kya aapke paas?
Executive: Haan haan mere paas haan haan just abhi mere paas ek miss call aaya hai toh call back kiya hu.
Customer: Achha achha isliye.
Executive: Pipe karke aapka ek product hai sir isme deal kar rahe hai aap?
Customer: Kis mein?
Customer: Cement pipe karke.
Executive: Cement pipe?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Usme toh deal nahi karte pipe vagera mein. Hamara actual mein filter media sand filter mein gravel pesticide hai matlab sand ka jo bhi item hota hai process karke hamara usi mein deal hai sara cheez.
Customer: Achha achha nahi isme bhi ek aapka woh aa raha tha ek lead.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Matlab aap isme buy lead consume kar rahe hai but aapke catalog pe listed nahi hai toh uske liye.
Executive: Achha woh bhi woh bhi consume hua hai kya?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achha achha actual mein madam kya baat hai na ki aap baat ek baar naam bata dijiye team mein bahut log hai na. Main confuse ho jati hu naam mein.
Executive: Nahi nahi bahut log nahi madam kis se baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Manish Singh bol raha hu main. Achha Manish ji baat kar rahe hai ji ji.
Executive: Ji ji ji actual mein toh number maine apna hi diya hua hai na woh matlab update karne ke baad. Aur main bola bhi hu ki matlab mere aur Manoj ji se hi matlab Manoj sir se hi baat kijiyega generally. Haan. Aur agar in case kabhi jarurat pada jaise baat yeh hai ki handling jo hai IndiaMART ka leads vagera consume karna woh ek Ankit ji karke hai hamare median. Haan haan. Karte hai woh cheez ko. But haan woh karte hai but unko direct matlab yeh nahi hai ki direct matlab woh baat kare woh handling ka kaam aap hi ka hai basically woh sirf leads pe focus karta hai requirement. Achha achha.
Executive: Haan haan haan requirement focus karta hai usko matlab aage woh process vagera karte hai. Baki jo bhi handling vagera woh main hi karta hu aur Manoj sir hi karte hai.
Customer: Ji main samajh gayi abhi abhi abhi jaise recently hamara lead bhi gadbadaya tha usse usse regarding main matlab apna number update karke fir woh matlab baat kiya tha.
Executive: Achha achha main yeh keh rahi thi sir yeh jo aapka ek product hai kya kehte hai water filtration ka iski lead ho sake toh aaj direct search karke consume kar lijiye.
Executive: Madam woh main koshish kar raha hu karne ka but jaise filter media sand ya filter media gravel ya fir water filtration sand matlab jo bhi keywords daal ke main search kar raha hu na. Toh us us types ke leads aa nahi rahi hai.
Customer: Uske direct lead nahi aa rahi hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi direct lead nahi aa rahi hai usme bhi aapka hepa filter media kaha ja raha hai fir jo bhi aapka silica sand kaha ja raha hai. Ab woh kyu aa raha hai matlab thoda sa matlab samajh mein nahi aa raha woh cheez.
Customer: Achha samne se inquiries aati hai us pe aata hai yeh aapko jo main bol rahi hu.
Executive: Sam samne se bhi jo inquiries aa rahi hai usme toh kuch kuch aate hai. Nahi toh bataya madam ki matlab mera work hai ki is cheez ko handling karke matlab dekhna ki haan sab kuch proper chal raha hai ya nahi. Haan haan.
Executive: Like like but jo consume karte hai woh ek Ankit ji hai ek Sameer Ghosh karke hai jinse baat hoti hai kabhi kabar aapki jo by message matlab woh meetings vagera arrange karwate hai. Haan haan. Haan haan. Toh main unse bhi matlab continuous proper yeh leta hu ki leads kis tarah ke aa rahe hai toh woh bhi abhi bol rahe hai ki nahi us tarah ka toh nahi aa raha keywords se bhi nahi aa rahe hai.
Customer: Toh aapne bataya tha kuch kuch sahi nahi hai toh maine bola ki thik hai chalo kuch din try karke dekho kya hota hai. Thik hai thik hai thodi si pehle se thik hi hui hai sir. Lekin bas yeh hai sab sahi abhi sab pe leads consume ho rahe hai bas water filtration wala jo hai na sand ka us pe thoda sa lead kam consume ho raha hai aur main chah rahi thi yeh active ho jata aapka. Ji ji.
Executive: Right right right madam kyuki kyuki us din jab aap logo ne jo meeting mein bhi Alok sir bhi aaye the toh us din water filtration sand ka hamara kafi kafi turn consume tha jabki overall jo leads aate hai woh bhi unhone dikhaya tha kafi jyada lead aaye hue the. But consumption kafi kam tha hmm.
Customer: Abhi idhar team toh matlab sir aapki team mein thoda sa issue main bata de rahi hu kya problem ho rahi hai. Hum team by leads bahut late consume kar rahe hai usse pehle woh lead expire ho ja rahi hai. Aur woh past by lead aap open kijiyega past by lead aapka jaha par by lead aap dekhte hai by lead balance. Ji.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ki kitne bonus hai. Waha pe upar past by lead likh ke aata hai waha click kijiyega. Sand filtration karke leads dikhengi jo consume ho chuki hai expire ho chuki hai usme jaake aap na I am interested type kar dijiyega. Matlab type nahi kijiyega I am interested pe click kar dijiyega. Kyuki leads hai but woh bahut tez iska jo competition hai bahut jyada hai toh lead kya hai woh consume bahut fast ho rahi hai. Okay okay.
Executive: Okay okay main main samajh raha hu matlab jo jinhe humne consume karne ka yeh diya hai woh thoda sa late delay kar rahe hai usko consume karne mein. Matlab hai.
Customer: Achha achha. 60% kya kehte hai woh 4 ghante ke andar consume karte hai baki woh 60% ke baad jo hai na usme kuch percent woh 2 ghante mein consume karte hai. Iske iske iske iske liye main maine matlab maine kya system bana rakha hai ki jis laptop pe work karte hai woh person Sameer Ghosh. Ji. Unko main already woh pura IndiaMART ka matlab open karwa ke rakhta hu page pe. Haan isliye theek hai aur unhe yeh bhi instruction rakha hu ki har. Toh toh 3 minutes ya 5 minutes right ek baar refresh karke consume kiya jaaye. Refresh karke haan haan yeh sahi hai lekin yeh jo past by lead mein aap woh kar dijiye I am interested kar dijiyega. Ji ji. Past by lead mein jaake waha pe water filtration ki leads pe I I am interested. Okay okay. Woh fir se woh woh dobara mujhe bata dijiyega madam kaha pe milega. By lead mein jaaye. Haan okay. Uske baad dekhiye bonus jaha par likh ke aata hai na by lead balance. Right. By lead balance. Haan jo aap click kijiyega haan usi ke upar past past leads likhe hue hai. Okay. Aap us pe click karenge toh sari woh leads aayengi jo consume ho chuki hai expire ho chuki hai. Jo consume ho chuki hai. Haan. Toh waha pe water filtration ka lagaiye filter. Ji. Ab dekhiye bahut sari leads I am interested pe click kar dijiye. Waha pe consume karte hai waha pe. I am interested. Okay okay matlab jo jo mujhse jo mujhse miss ho gayi hai usko I am interested karke main daal dunga toh matlab usse. Sir usse yeh hai ki server ko pata chalega na ki aap isme deal karte hai toh aise leads aapko jaldi dikhengi. Bilkul bilkul madam wahi wahi cheez chahiye ji. Thik hai toh aap yeh kijiye and iski lead mile toh aap ek baar consume jarur kar lijiye aaj. Ji ji. Abhi by leads mein bhi ek baar daal dijiyega and water filtration ka aur milta hai toh usko kabhi consume jarur kijiye thik hai. Okay okay madam aur jab bhi kuch is tarah ka matlab yeh rahe na toh madam aap direct matlab mere number pe connect kijiyega. Thik thik. Mere direct number pe. Okay sir. Okay. Okay. Okay. Thank you. Thank you madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Water filtration leads not being consumed.

- Wants to activate water filtration leads.

- Team consumes leads very late.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to mark leads as interested.

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will mark leads as interested.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, water filtration, leads, consumption
